content.question: The kinetic energy of a moving object changes from <math alttext="K sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>K</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math> to <math alttext="4 K sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>4</mn><msub><mi>K</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math>. skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
